entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
